name: Trials Bike GO
description:
Hop on your bike and race, jump and flip your way to victory! Non-stop HIGH OCTANE RACING ACTION in the new AWESOME quality game from AceViral and the team who brought you Bike Mania!

- Colorful 3D HD graphics!
- COMPETE across the different and unique worlds!
- COLLECT medals and complete objectives!
- EQUIP different helmets, outfits and body armour!
- CUSTOMISE your bike with different frames, wheels and exhausts!
- WIN races and earn coins and trophies!
- RACE, compete and challenge your friends!
- MULTIPLAYER rooms to race against the world!
- ACHIEVEMENTS to unlock and show off your skills!

Updated with the coolest features and gameplay packed with content, you will love doing flips, tricks and stunts off ramps while competing to be the BEST!

Download now and join your friends in the fun! Play NOW!
